pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Urho3D is a game engine for 2D and 3D games with scripting abilities.
It supports AngelScript, Lua, C++ to script games.
It allows to export WebAssembly (WASM) web browser games though Emscripten.
It supports realistic physics with Bullet and Box2D.
URHO3D_RPI_CONFIG and URHO3D_ANDROID_CONFIG may be set as a per-package environmental variable to tune the configure stage for android and rpi builds. The options must be space separated.
Examples: URHO3D_RPI_CONFIG="-DRPI_ABI=armeabi-v7a" URHO3D_ANDROID_CONFIG="-DANDROID_ABI=armeabi-v7a"
Cross compile status on ebuild level:
Android - incomplete / untested Emscripten - working RPI - incomplete / untested
Notes:
Emscripten can be built on native but Android and RPI should be built in crossdev environment.
